attributes.additional_details: I am sure we are all fed up with being threatened.
attributes.background:
Put our submarines back in Southampton or Portsmouth and the Jobs. Stop supporting multi government seats and houses-we only need one.
Remove financial support from North Sea Oil and its loss making due to poor management

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "Stop supporting multi government seats and houses". We're not sure whether you would like changes to be made to devolution in Wales and Northern Ireland as well, or whether you would simply like Scotland to be an independent nation. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
